person.name: John Doe
person.summary: John graduated with a Bachelor of Architecture. He loves to travel for new experiences and inspiration; architecture is his passion.
person.text:
John is the founder and CEO of EXAMPLE Architects. Prior to founding the firm in 1996, John worked in Copenhagen and Berlin for well-known companies. "My goal as an architect is to support clients in realizing buildings that promote their ambitions and dreams. I believe that a building can and should reflect the tastes and values of its owners and users", a philosophy that permeates the entire company.

John graduated with a Bachelor of Architecture. He loves to travel for new experiences and inspiration; architecture is his passion.

person.name: Dan Star
person.summary: Dan has extensive knowledge of Building Information Modeling (BIM), technical and sustainable design and building performance.
person.text:
Dan joined EXAMPLE Architects in 2017. He is a civil engineer with a Bachelor's degree in architectural technology and construction management from VIA University College in Denmark and a New Zealand diploma in architectural technology.

Dan has extensive knowledge in Building Information Modeling (BIM), technical and sustainable design. He positions himself as a guardian of building performance.
